document_data.mainbody:
Goldwake was a sea captain and a worshiper of Umberlee who prayed at the Water Queens House in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Goldwake was a human woman with a light skin tone and hazel eyes. She wore a set of heavy splint mail and a helmet.
Circa the , during the Absolute crisis, Captain Goldwake frequented the Water Queens House, uttering prayers to her goddess. She was at the temple shortly after one of its priestesses, Holli Dylford, drowned whilst swimming in the Gray Harbor. Goldwake wanted to appease the Bitch Queen before a voyage but found all the priestesses preoccupied with the last rights ceremony for Holli.
